name: Emergency Discharge Destination
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to represent the destination of the patient on discharge from the Emergency Care Attendance.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Discharge to hospital at home service (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to intensive care unit (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to special care baby unit (procedure)
Patient transfer, to another health care facility (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to high dependency unit (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to emergency department short stay ward (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to neonatal intensive care unit (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to coronary care unit (procedure)
Emergency department discharge to ambulatory emergency care service (procedure)
